cast.overview: Captain Glass of the USS Arkansas discovers that a coup d'état is taking place in Russia, so he and his crew join an elite group working on the ground to prevent a war.
cast.title: Hunter Killer

details.biography: Sarah Middleton is a young British Actor from Derby. She began acting locally at the age of 6 and has performed as a member of YMT:UK and the National Youth Theatre of Great Britain. She trained at Birmingham School of Acting from 2008-11. Sarah recently appeared as a finalist on Andrew Lloyd Webber's search for a Dorothy, but since then has been focusing on a career in Acting. Sarah made her first appearance as Beany in 'Toast' (2010)
details.name: Sarah Middleton
